All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface CouponsDAO

  • Method Details

    • isCouponExists

      boolean isCouponExists​(int id) throws CouponSystemException
      Check if coupon already exists in DataBase.
      Parameters:
      id - - of coupon to be checked by.
      Returns:
      true if coupon exists, false if coupon does not exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if checking coupon from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • addCoupon

      int addCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Add a new coupon to DataBase.
      Parameters:
      coupon - - to be added.
      Returns:
      number of affected rows, 0 if there're no affected rows.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if adding coupon to DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • updateCoupon

      int updateCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Update an exists coupon in DataBase.
      Parameters:
      coupon - - to be update by the current fields.
      Returns:
      number of affected rows, 0 if there're no affected rows.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if updating coupon in DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • deleteCoupon

      int deleteCoupon​(int couponID) throws CouponSystemException
      Delete an exists coupon in DataBase.
      Parameters:
      couponID - - of coupon to delete a coupon by.
      Returns:
      number of affected rows, 0 if there're no affected rows.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if deleting coupon from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • addCouponPurchase

      int addCouponPurchase​(int customerId, int couponID) throws CouponSystemException
      Register a purchase of coupon by customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - - of customer who bought the coupon.
      couponID - - of coupon got bought.
      Returns:
      number of affected rows, 0 if there're no affected rows.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if registering coupon purchase to DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • deleteCouponPurchase

      int deleteCouponPurchase​(int customerId, int couponID) throws CouponSystemException
      Remove a coupon from customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - - of customer to remove coupon.
      couponID - - of coupon to be removed.
      Returns:
      number of affected rows, 0 if there're no affected rows.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if deleting coupon purchase from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • isCouponExistsInCompanyByTitle

      boolean isCouponExistsInCompanyByTitle​(java.lang.String title, int companyId) throws CouponSystemException
      Check if coupon title already exists in selected company in DataBase.
      Parameters:
      title - - of coupon to be checked by.
      companyId - - of company to check by.
      Returns:
      true if coupon title exists in the company, false if coupon title does not exist.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if checking coupon from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

      couponID - - of coupon to delete by.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if delete coupon purchases from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getAllCouponsByCompany

      java.util.List<Coupon> getAllCouponsByCompany​(int companyId) throws CouponSystemException
      Get a list of coupon belongs to specific company from DataBase.
      Parameters:
      companyId - - Id of company to get coupons by.
      Returns:
      List - of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getAllCouponsOfCompanyByCategory

      java.util.List<Coupon> getAllCouponsOfCompanyByCategory​(int companyId, int categoryId) throws CouponSystemException
      Get a list of coupon belongs to specific company in specific category from DataBase.
      Parameters:
      companyId - - Id of company to get coupons by.
      categoryId - - to sort by.
      Returns:
      List - of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -if there's no coupon found on this category or company or if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • getCouponsOfCompanyByMaxPrice

      java.util.List<Coupon> getCouponsOfCompanyByMaxPrice​(int companyId, double price) throws CouponSystemException
      Get a list of coupon belongs to specific company which price lower than the given price from DataBase.
      Parameters:
      companyId - - to get coupons belongs to.
      price - - to sort by.
      Returns:
      list - a list of coupons
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if there's no coupons found by those conditions or if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • isCouponPurchased

      boolean isCouponPurchased​(int couponId, int customerID) throws CouponSystemException
      Check if customer already purchased specific coupon.
      Parameters:
      couponId - - to check purchases by.
      customerID - - to check purchases belongs to selected customer
      Returns:
      true if coupon already purchased by this customer, false if this customer didn't purchase the coupon yet.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if there's no coupons found by those parameters or if getting coupons from DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • deleteCouponByExpiryDate

      void deleteCouponByExpiryDate​(java.time.LocalDate date) throws CouponSystemException
      Delete coupons for DataBase which expire date is given date.
      Parameters:
      date - - to filter by.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if deleting coupons in DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.
